TEXT.TITLE: ST LOUIS HOGS UP 1.00/1.25 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: Barrows and gilt prices rose 1.00 to 1.25 dlr in active trade, usda said. Top 51.25 dlrs per cwt. US 1-3 210-270 lbs 50.50-51.00 and 100 head 51.25. sows - scarce. us 1-3 over 550 lbs 47.00-48.00. Reuter
